column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I feel like I give out a lot of 5 star reviews like drunk people give out likes on IG
column2: but JINYA was SO DAMN GOOD! I guess it pays off that I typically do my hw before trying a new place -Â especially when we're craving something specific. Parking next door at the cramped 24 lot was tricky
column3: but coming from LA it really wasn't bad at all. The crowd out front was a little intimidating
column4: but our wait was estimated to be about 40 mins. Not bad at all
column5: perfect time enough to grab a beer at the Italian place adjacent to JINYA.
